author: darrell
msg: Added .cvsignore to /lib, to ignore libs not included in CVS.

author: darrell
msg: Replaced use of custom MessageFlags with regular javax.mail.Flags

author: darrell
msg: - Split out session-specific Mailbox info, for handling expunge or addition by a different
session. The RECENT and FETCH responses are not yet handled for external chang:es.
- Moved expunge(), copy() and search() off the ImapHost, and onto the Mailbox.
